Pengusaha Angkutan Tutup Trayek Gara-gara Bandara Kertajati Sepi
01 Nov 2019, 11:26 by Sudirman Wamad


Foto: dok. BIJB

Majalengka - Pengusaha angkutan umum di Cirebon terpaksa menutup trayek tujuan Bandara Internasional Jawa Barat (BIJB) atau Bandara Kertajati di Kabupaten Majalengka, Jawa Barat. Penutupan trayek tujuan BIJB itu disebabkan karena sepinya penumpang. Sekretaris DPC Organda Kota Cirebon Karsono membenarkan adanya penutupan trayek tujuan BIJB itu. "Sekarang BIJB kan sepi, senyap kembali. Sekarang memang sudah pada tutup. Ya rata-rata lah, di Cirebon itu ada sekitar 15 pengusaha angkutan yang sempat membuka shuttle arah BIJB," kata Karsono kepada detikcom melalui sambungan telepon, Jumat (1/1/2019).Karsono menceritakan pengusaha angkutan di Cirebon sempat menyambut antusias kebijakan Gubernur Jawa Barat Ridwan Kamil, yang mengalihkan sejumlah penerbangan komersil dari Bandara Husein Sastranegara ke BIJB. Namun, Karsono menyayangkan kebijakan tersebut tak bertahan lama. "Masyarakat, khususnya anggota Organda merespon positif. Sampai menempuh sejumlah perizinan. Waktu itu ada 19 penerbangan kalau nggak salah. Tapi pada kenyataannya Husein tetap melakukan penerbangan komersil," tutur Karsono.Menurutnya masih adanya penerbangan komersil di Bandara Husein Sastranegara membuat BIJB ditinggalkan penumpang. Imbasnya, angkutan umum tujuan BIJB pun loyo. Selain itu, Karsono menilai sepinya angkutan penumpang tujuan BIJB disebabkan juga adanya kebijakan yang menggratiskan Damri."Ini (Damri gratis) mengambil peluang pengusaha swasta. Kita akhirnya kehilangan penumpang. Yang jelas, kami hanya meminta kebijakan yang konsisten untuk mengoptimalisasikan BIJB," kata Karsono.Simak Video "Lahan di Area Bandara Kertajati Terbakar"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hns/hns)

Transportation Entrepreneurs Close Route due to Kertajati Airport Sepi
Nov 01 2019, 11:26 by Sudirman Wamad


Photo: dock. BIJB

Majalengka - Public transport entrepreneurs in Cirebon are forced to close routes to the West Java International Airport (BIJB) or Kertajati Airport in Majalengka Regency, West Java. The closure of the BIJB destination route was caused by the lack of passengers. DPC Organda Secretary of Cirebon City Karsono confirmed the closure of the BIJB destination route. "Now BIJB is quiet, quiet again. Now it is closed. Yes, on average, in Cirebon there are around 15 transportation entrepreneurs who had opened the BIJB shuttle," Karsono told AFP via telephone, Friday (1/1) /2019).Karsono said that transportation entrepreneurs in Cirebon welcomed enthusiastically the policy of West Java Governor Ridwan Kamil, who diverted a number of commercial flights from Husein Sastranegara Airport to BIJB. However, Karsono regretted that the policy did not last long. "The public, especially members of Organda responded positively. Until they took a number of licenses. At that time there were 19 flights if I am not mistaken. But in fact Husein still carried out commercial flights," said Karsono.According to him there were still commercial flights at Husein Sastranegara Airport leaving BIJB abandoned by passengers. As a result, public transportation to BIJB was sluggish. In addition, Karsono assessed that the lack of passenger transportation to BIJB was also due to the existence of a policy that would free Damri. "This (Damri is free) takes the opportunity of private entrepreneurs. We end up losing passengers. Clearly, we only ask for a consistent policy to optimize BIJB," said Karsono Video Watch "Kertajati Airport Area Is Burned" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (hns / hns)
